Package com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toClient

Class ClientPacket

java.lang.Object
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.Packet
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toClient.ClientPacket
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvalidGamePacket, InvalidSessionPacket, ListPacket, NewSessionPacket, NotInGamePacket, PacketNotFoundPacket, ResultPacket, ReturnBoardPacket, ReturnChatPacket, ReturnNewGamePacket, ReturnPlayersPacket, ReturnSettingsPacket, ReturnStatePacket, ReturnTestPacket
public abstract class ClientPacket extends com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.Packet
Packet returned to client. Most just stores data that will be sent to client. A few accept more complex parameters to convert into data to store.
